body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Laws & Policies              Laws & Policies       The Superintendent's Compendium (487kb, pdf) is a compilations of designations, closures, permit requirements, and other restrictions made by the superintendent, in addition to what is contained in Title 36 of the Code of Federal Regulations (Chapter 1, Parts 1 through 7 and 34). Most applicable to Tumacácori's visitors include the policies on firearms and pets. Larger guiding documents for the National Park Service include: National Park Service Policies National Park Service Director's Orders
